description: Detects usage of findstr with the "EVERYONE" or "BUILTIN" keywords. This is seen being used in combination with "icacls" to look for misconfigured files or folders permissions
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Permission Misconfiguration Reconnaissance Via Findstr.EXE
query: (((((process.executable.text:"*\\findstr.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"FINDSTR.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\"Everyone\"*" OR "*'Everyone'*" OR "*\"BUILTIN\\\"*" OR "*'BUILTIN\\'*"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*icacls\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*findstr\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*Everyone*")))
